type: Tutorial Step - You Are In Command

definition.text: The search box in the Docs has a double life. Sometimes she searches, but other times she commands, and does stuff... whatever you tell her!

paragraphs.text: I mean the search box is also a command line interface! The list of available commands has to do with:
Let's work on a practical example that involves the two! I'll teach you how to edit the docs, and how to contribute, using a couple of commands!
I'll set up the next few steps with a little story... I hope you like the idea!
